Attribute.Name: CountAlertsGeneratedAfterInHours
Attribute.Description:
If this Attribute is set, a count will be shown for exceptions in the user's subscribed queues that were generated after a specific time. The time is calculated as the current time less the specified number of hours.
If the IncludeAlertsInUsersDepartmentQueue Attribute is Y, the count will also be shown for exceptions in the user's department queues.

Attribute.Name: CountAlertsGeneratedBeforeInHours
Attribute.Description:
If this Attribute is set, a count will be shown for exceptions in the user's subscribed queues that were generated before a specific time. The time is calculated as the current time less the specified number of hours.
If the IncludeAlertsInUsersDepartmentQueue Attribute is Y, the count will also be shown for exceptions in the user's department queues.

Attribute.Name: IncludeAlertsAssignedToUser
Attribute.Description:
If this Attribute is Y,statistics will be shown for exceptions assigned to the user.
This should not be set Y if user is subscribed to no queues and ShowAllForNoQueues is Y.

Attribute.Name: IncludeAlertsInUsersDepartmentQueue
Attribute.Description: If this Attribute is Y,statistics will be shown for exceptions in the users department queues in addition to those in his queues.

Attribute.Name: IncludeAlertsOwnedByUsersOrg
Attribute.Description:
If this Attribute is Y,statistics will be shown for exceptions owned by users organization.
This should not be set Y if user is subscribed to no queues and ShowAllForNoQueues is Y.

Attribute.Name: ShowAllForNoQueues
Attribute.Description:
Default for this attribute is always Y.
If this is N,statistics won't we shown for all alerts when user is not subscribed to any Queues.

Attribute.Name: UserId
Attribute.Description: User for whom alert statistics is requested.

Attribute.Name: Status
Attribute.Description: Status of the Alerts to be considered. This status filter is applied to all unresolved alerts with ActiveFlag = 'Y'.
